skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Although lacking the finesse of Elven magics, the sorceries of the north are no less potent, for they channel furious, Daemonic power.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5
Melee defence: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The swamp will rise again, its inhabitants enjoying the blessings of the Dark Gods once more.

effects.description: Melee attack: +3
Weapon strength: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: The same enchanted mist that obscures Fimir Balefiend dwellings can also be conjured to confound and horrify would-be attackers on the battlefield.

effects.description: Armour: +20
Melee defence: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Strange talismans and mouldy bone charms of the fens can often carry unique and unforeseen boons and side effects.

effects.description:
Spell resistance: -5%
	(enemy armies in province)

Missile resistance: -5%
	(enemy armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: They can see the Winds of Magic's ebb and flow, enabling them to make the best use of the magical power available.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 10%
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +4
Spell resistance: 25%
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

skillTree.localised_description: For some, deathly agony is what awakens true power. They bleed willingly to conjure storms no mortals should wield.

effects.description: Spell intensity: +30%
Passive ability: "Dangerous Practice"

skillTree.localised_description: Do not underestimate the strength of a battle-hardened warrior-sorcerer, for a Champion can fall to one gifted in sorcery in many ways.

effects.description: Hit points: +10%
Wound recovery time: -2 turns
Melee attack: +10

skillTree.localised_description: Intrinsically connected to the Chaos-infused lands of their dwelling, the very earth responds to their will.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 5%
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 15
Campaign line of sight: +50%

skillTree.localised_description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: A conjured shadow is just as obfuscating as a real one - the Shadow Wizard is master or mistress of the 'concealing' arts.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Smoke & Mirrors"

skillTree.localised_description: When cast, this spell enfeebles enemy minds; they feel the crushing weight of reality bearing down upon them.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base
